trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmulateRecognizeCompleted" name="EmulateRecognizeCompleted" href=""></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> and <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> classes.
trans-unit.target: データを提供、 <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmulateRecognizeCompleted" name="EmulateRecognizeCompleted" href=""> </xref>のイベント、 <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref>と<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>クラスです。

trans-unit.source: An instance of EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs のインスタンスが作成されたときに、<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>オブジェクト、<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted>イベント</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>。

trans-unit.source: To obtain information about the result of recognition, access the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: 認識の結果に関する情報を入手するには、アクセス、<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>イベントのハンドラーのプロパティ</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Emulation is the process by which text, instead of audio, is the input to a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: エミュレーションは、プロセスであり、オーディオではなく、テキストに音声認識エンジンへの入力です。

trans-unit.source: To bypass the audio inputs for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object during emulation, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: オーディオの入力をバイパスする、<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>エミュレーションでは、使用中にオブジェクトを<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>メソッド</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>。

trans-unit.source: If the speech recognition engine encounters an exception during the recognition operation, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property is set to the exception and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 音声認識エンジンが認識操作中に例外が発生した場合、<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>プロパティが例外に設定され、<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>プロパティに設定されている`null`</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A></xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the results of emulated recognition.
trans-unit.target: エミュレートされた認識の結果を取得します。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> and contains full information about a phrase returned by a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>から派生したオブジェクト<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>認識操作によって返される語句に関する完全な情報が含まれています</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain a list off all the recognition candidates from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: すべての認識候補オフ一覧を取得することができます、<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>プロパティ</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If recognizer encounters an exception during the recognition operation, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property is set to the exception and the Result property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 認識エンジンが認識操作中に例外が発生した場合、<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>例外にプロパティが設定され、結果のプロパティに設定`null`</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Detailed information about the results of recognition, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if an error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 認識の結果に関する詳細情報または<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>場合はエラーが発生しました。
